What to Know About Stellenbosch University Student Portal

Stellenbosch University Student Portal allows formal and prospective students in the College to create an account or log in to perform certain academic actions at ease including Course Registration, Fees Payment, Exam Results, Admission Online Application, Application Status, Acceptance Fees Payment, Transcript, Timetable, Academic Calander, Extra Credit Hours, Deferment of Admission and so much more.

Stellenbosch University Student Portal

Student Login portal of the Stellenbosch University is accessible as follows;

Stellenbosch University Student Portal | Check Now

To view the portal, you will need your Stellenbosch University Student Login ID and Password respective.

To access the Stellenbosch University Student Portal, please follow these steps:

  1. Open a web browser on your computer or mobile device.
  2. In the address bar, type in the official website of Stellenbosch University, which is “www.sun.ac.za” and press Enter.
  3. On the Stellenbosch University website, locate the “Current Students” section or a similar option on the homepage. It is typically found in the top navigation menu or as a prominent link.
  4. Click on the “Current Students” link to access the student-specific information and resources.
  5. Look for the “Student Portal” or “my.sun” link within the Current Students section. Click on it to proceed.
  6. You will be redirected to the Stellenbosch University Student Portal login page.
  7. On the login page, enter your student number or username and your password in the provided fields.
  8. Once you have entered your login credentials, click on the “Login” or “Sign In” button to access the Stellenbosch University Student Portal.

You should be redirected to your official portal where you can access all the information you need.
